author: Kjell J
comment: Needs a better dim mode! Otherwise a nice face.

author: David Gregory
comment: Used this until I started getting notifications pushed to download other apps.  Deleted immediately.  Annoying to purchase something only to get spammed with garbage that I never wanted.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi David, Very sorry to hear you've experience this issue from our side, We can assure this wont be happens in future,Thank you for your time

title: Watchface pushes notifications to get other apps

author: Glynn May
comment: Good looking face but has issues. The battery icon on the watch reads 63% but my watch is 100% charged. The heart rate monitor does not work neither does the step counter so not happy with paying £0.73 for something that does not do what it says on the tin. Get these problems ironed out and you will have a watch face that will take some beating.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Glynn,  If you are android Marshmallow user you need give   persmission to heart rate and step counter sensor and there are lots of customize setting there ,kindly consider your reviews ,Thanks for your Feedback

author: Ron Riggi
comment: Had this watch face until it decided it was a good idea to send me notifications to download other applications. Well the first notification I got resulted in their app being removed, and will never be downloaded again.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Ron, Very sorry to hear you've experience this issue from our side, We can assure this wont be happens in future,Thank you for your time

reply.content: Hi Andrew ,Thanks for letting us know about your experience with our watch face and my sincere apologize if our watch face did not meet your expectations.We will soon add many more colors on the watch face

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Joseph, Very sorry to hear you've experience this issue from our side, We can assure this wont be happens in future,Thank you for your time

author: Joseph Bdaro
comment: Really awesome watch face but the only problem is when it hits 5 o clock. It shows 50 instead of 05. Not sure why it does that

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Joseph,Thank you for pointing out the defect. We'll rectify it shortly. Use the watch face again and kindly consider your review, if you feel it is good.

title: Has somewhat of a problem

author: Ron Chandler
comment: Use the features alot. Love the cockpit look.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Ron! Thanks for your valuable feedback. It’ll let us keep making best for you,also consider other watch faces of us

title: Very techy

author: Daniel Tyson
comment: The Space Armour Watch Face looks fantastic, but has issues.  The information displayed and the watch face itself look great. There's some issues though. My main concern was battery life. With the stock watch faces I can put the watch on at 5am and still have 30% left at 10-11pm that night, with the Space Armour watch face it was dead at 3pm.  My other concern was the watch battery indicator remained at 100% the entire day so I actually had no idea it was running out till the Android Wear battery warning popped up saying 15% left.  Good design, but possibly the heart rate monitor needs to be an interval based thing.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Daniel,Appreciate you for giving your priceless time for us and You can Save your battery by  switch ON/OFF the sensors To know more about setting http://insideglobe.com/with-this-watch-face-feel-like-an-astronaut/  We really love your ideas and make it done in our next updates

author: Cassandra Wickens
comment: Great watch face! I am really enjoying it, however, there are a few issues. 5 o'clock on the dial reads as 50 instead of 05. When changing it to 24h mode, the dial remains in 12h mode. Some more colors would be nice as well :)

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Peter,We are very much sorry that our watch face disappoint you ,We will surely fix these issue in the future update  ,Kindly reconsider you rating Thank you for your time

title: Looking good!

author: Vic Zhong
comment: I like this face, but I would love it if the ambient face had true black instead of grey, so it saves on battery and screen lifespan for my OLED screen.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Vic! .We have touched these things in our next update which will hit you soon ,reconsider your reviews ,Thanks for your valuable feedback

author: Mike Johnson
comment: I tried looking in the settings but it only has an option to set the temperature time interval, not units

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Mike ,You can change the Temperature to Fahrenheit on setting using Temperature Scale option ,If there’s anything , don’t hesitate to let us know. We always love to assist you ,Kindly reconsider your rating ,Thank you for the time

title: Can't change temperature to Fahrenheit

author: Qban Celli
comment: I can't change the weather from Celsius to Fahrenheit. There isn't an option in the phone app settings.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Qban ,You can change the weather setting from Cesius to Fahrenheit in the setting using the option, Temprature Scale to know more about setting visit this link http://insideglobe.com/with-this-watch-face-feel-like-an-astronaut/ ,Kindly reconsider your reviews ,Thank you for your feedback

comment: The ambient face doesn't use the backlight well, and the step and hr is still there when deactivated

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Evan ,We have touched these things in our next update which will hit you soon ,Thanks for your valuable feedback

comment: I like it but the ambient mode is too dim.  Could you please improve this.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Kenneth , We are pleased with your feedback. We really love take your ideas and try to make it  done soon  in our next updates

title: Beautiful

comment: I seriously love the look of this watch, but it looks to still be scaled for a 360 v1. Its assets are all over the place and it crashes a few seconds after launch

reply.content: Hi Kalen, We are happy to know that you Love the look ,We have touched on these things in our recent update,  Now the app is ready for all android wear watches, Kindly reconsider your reviews,Thank for your feedback

title: Awesome looking, but does not work with 360 v2

author: rollie hui
comment: Would it be possible to change the digital time to time zone 1 (in referring to watchmaker)?  As there is cool big analog clock above a second time set to time zone 1 or an option for me to set it manually somehow would be excellent.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Rollie ,We will consider your suggestion in our next update ,Thank you for the feedback

title: Digital time...

author: Trevor Gardiner
comment: This is quickly becoming one of my go to watch faces. Would be nice to see the seconds still going while in inactive mode and please do a fahrenheit temperature option soon! Really digging the future look with clear cohesively placed icons that makes this a top tier watch face. Great work so far and a lot of value for the small price!!

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Trevor, We are happy to know that you like the watch face,We have touched on these things in our recent update, now you can shift temperature from Fahrenheit to Celsius and many other things,check this link http://goo.gl/m5e6qj  for more details,Thanks for your support :)

title: Grows on you

comment: Is there a setting for 24h clock?

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: yup it is.. :)

title: 24h support?

author: BALA VIJAY
comment: Great team work

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Bala, We are happy to know that you like the watch face ,Thanks for your support :)

author: Ryan Joseph
comment: I love the design of this face, one of the best I've seen. But it has zero options for display, and the ambient mode is crap. It shows a solid gray background across the entire face in ambient, which isn't good for AMOLED watches. Also there's no option to keep some color in ambient, which many watches now support.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Ryan,We have recently updated the app now you can switch on/off the sensors heart rate and also the step sensor, sure your watch will long hours as we save battery, check this link http://goo.gl/m5e6qj  for more details, Kindly reconsider your reviews, Thank you

title: Needs more options
